content.en: Virtual Screening Advancements: Virtual high-throughput screening techniques are being used to bridge the gap between virtual libraries and in silico methods, with algorithms like 4SCan/vADME helping to screen databases and evaluate compound properties. The accuracy of protein-ligand docking, binding energy estimation, and virtual screening can be improved through the use of algorithms like Lead Finder, which combines genetic algorithms with optimization procedures and scoring functions. Additionally, algorithms such as PharmaGist efficiently detect pharmacophores and perform virtual screening on large compound databases, enhancing the efficiency of pharmacophore-based virtual screening.
content.da: Virtuelle screening fremskridt: Virtuelle højthroughput screeneteknikker bruges til at bygge bro mellem virtuelle biblioteker og in silico-metoder, med algoritmer som 4SCan/vADME, der hjælper med at screene databaser og evaluere forbindelsers egenskaber. Nøjagtigheden af protein-ligand docking, bindingsenergiberegning og virtuel screening kan forbedres ved brug af algoritmer som Lead Finder, der kombinerer genetiske algoritmer med optimeringsprocedurer og scoringsfunktioner. Derudover kan algoritmer som PharmaGist effektivt opdage farmakoforer og udføre virtuel screening på store forbindelsesdatabaser, hvilket øger effektiviteten af farmakoforbaseret virtuel screening.
